coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: Strong and bold coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: A rich espresso with steamed milk and topped with a thick layer of milk foam.

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: Smooth and creamy espresso mixed with steamed milk.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: Espresso with added hot water for a milder flavor.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: A delightful combination of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: A strong coffee with velvety microfoam, popular in Australia and New Zealand.

coffees.name: Affogato
coffees.description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso.

coffees.name: Cold Brew
coffees.description: Coffee brewed with cold water for a smooth and refreshing taste.

coffees.name: Iced Coffee
coffees.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for hot days.

coffees.name: Irish Coffee
coffees.description: A classic cocktail made with hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and cream.

coffees.name: Nitro Coffee
coffees.description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen for a creamy, frothy texture.

coffees.name: Dalgona Coffee
coffees.description: A whipped coffee drink made with instant coffee, sugar, and hot water.
